resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
AlenkaF opened a new pull request, #14010:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14010

   This PR tries to change PyArrow to be built in release and not in debug mode for Benchmarks builds.

URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14010#issuecomment-1233031618

   Commit 641434c9d70a66e3e964928dfdd2c5da1a4c1f77 already has scheduled benchmark runs.

pitrou commented on PR #14010:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14010#issuecomment-1233069179

   Ok, so the "CMake for PyArrow C++" step seems to run in DEBUG mode on [master](https://buildkite.com/apache-arrow/arrow-bci-benchmark-on-ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2/builds/1395#0182f319-c9c0-427a-a98e-94b6045d698f/33-2551) but in RELEASE mode on [this PR](https://buildkite.com/apache-arrow/arrow-bci-benchmark-on-ursa-i9-9960x/builds/1393#0182f445-ebc2-4f6c-abdd-0c69c2e833fd/36-2615).
   
   This is with the caveat that I had to compare two different benchmarking configurations, since some have failed.

AlenkaF commented on PR #14010:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14010#issuecomment-1233290684

   If I understand correctly you are confirming this PR makes the correct change in the Benchmark build?

pitrou commented on PR #14010:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14010#issuecomment-1233315115

   > If I understand correctly you are confirming this PR makes the correct change in the Benchmark build?
   
   Yes :-)

AlenkaF commented on PR #14010:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14010#issuecomment-1233897564

   Will rebase and run another benchmark, just to be sure. After that I would merge this PR, if there is no objection.

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
After a benchmark regression was identified in the [Python refactoring PR|https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13311] we identified the cause is in the build script for benchmarks. In the file _dev/conbench_envs/hooks.sh_ the script used to build PyArrow is _ci/scripts/python_build.sh_ where the default for PyArrow build type is set to *debug* (assuming _CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE_ isn't defined)

See:
[https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/74dae618ed8d6b492bf3b88e3b9b7dfd4c21e8d8/dev/conbench_envs/hooks.sh#L60-L62]
[https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/93b63e8f3b4880927ccbd5522c967df79e926cda/ci/scripts/python_build.sh#L55] 

I think we need to change the build type to release in _dev/conbench_envs/hooks.sh_ (_build_arrow_python()_) or maybe better to set the variable _CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE_ to release in _dev/conbench_envs/benchmarks.env_.
fields.summary: [Benchmarks] Default build for PyArrow seems to be debug
